tool.name: qiime2 fondue get-ids-from-query
tool.description: Find SRA run accession IDs based on a search query.

param.name: query
param.label: query: Str
param.help: [required] Search query to retrieve SRA run IDs from the BioSample database.
param.validator: value is not None and len(value) > 0

param.name: email
param.label: email: Str
param.validator: value is not None and len(value) > 0

param.name: threads
param.label: threads: Int % Range(1, None)
param.help: [default: 1] Number of threads to be used for parallelization of the data download from NCBI. Not to be confused with the number of parsl workers which can be configured through the parsl configuration file.

tool.help:
QIIME 2: fondue get-ids-from-query ================================== Find SRA run accession IDs based on a search query.
Outputs: -------- :ids.qza: Table containing metadata for all the requested IDs.
|
Description: ------------ Find SRA run accession IDs in the BioSample database using a text search query.
|
